DROP TABLE [dbo].[ClaimApprovalStatus_Dev]


Create Table [dbo].[ClaimApprovalStatus_Dev]
(

ClaimFIRNo VARCHAR(40),
IsClaimApproved int DEFAULT(NULL)
)


INSERT INTO [dbo].[ClaimApprovalStatus_Dev] (ClaimFIRNo)
SELECT distinct ClaimFIRNo from dbo.ClaimsSummary
